name: Glizdor
overview: Glizdor is an Action game, developed and published by Fundacja Edukacji Technologicznej, which was released in Europe in 1993. Glizdor is an action puzzle game for up to three players. The game allows to use a joystick and definable keys with four movement directions and one action key. The chosen character moves continuously in the manner known from Light Cycle games or Snake games. Each level of the game is preceded by guidelines. Performing all the required actions allows reaching the exit. Contact with any object (excluding exit gate) on the board means the loss of life. The game features level editor.
